subject: A shipment from order #SSN2625 is on the way
description_text:
Hi,

Can you please double-check with your logistics provider whether it is
planned to be delivered at some point or not? Do I need to wait some more
time, or can it not be delivered in the near future?

conversations.body_text:
Any updates?

вс, 7 дек. 2025 г. в 09:14, service@simsonn.com

Hi Иван Ткачев,    We apologize for the delayed response. The carrier has informed us that there has been no movement on this shipment yet. We will continue to monitor its status for you. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Hi
Can you please return my money and cancel this order?
This order created 4 month ago and no news about estimated delivery date.
I can't wait this order for the several years.

пт, 12 дек. 2025 г., 14:20 service@simsonn.com
